E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1988
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
The time has come. I'll leave the show after this year.
I guess I will have to make room for the young players.

Sincerely,
Andres Echeverria



Date: Thursday, 4/24/1988
Subject: Billy Plath healing process
Billy Plath is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
